\AuraCli

Namespaces

Exception

Interfaces

SignalInterface An interface for signal managers.
TranslatorInterface TranslatorInterface

Classes

AbstractCommand The CLI equivalent of a page-controller to perform a single action.
Context Collection point for information about the command-line execution context.
Exception Generic package exception.
ExceptionFactory A factory to create exception objects with translated messages.
Getopt Retrieves and validates command-line options and parameter values.
Option Defines a single command-line option.
OptionFactory A factory to create Option objects.
Signal A basic signal manager for executing controller hooks.
Stdio Provides a wrapper for standard input/output handles.
StdioResource An object-oriented wrapper for resource streams.
Translator Translator to translate the message
Vt100 Text formatting for VT100 terminals.
